info.name: Adapted Aasimar
info.description: Adapted Aasimar race for the Alfallen races from The Compendium of Forgotten Secrets.
info.author: DA3monking

description.p: Though birthed from a line blessed by celstials, the Alrisen can and have influenced these unique individuals. Their appearance, while normaly of unatural beauty, may be warped to a hideous visage or one of the most pure aspects of their Alrisen influence.
You gain the Darkvision and Celestial Resistance racial feature. Your base walking speed is 30 feet, and your size is Medium.
